name: Operation Sheep Defense
description: Operation Sheep Defense is a fast paced tower defense game. Featuring dynamic levels and intelligent enemy behavior. Shape the enemy path or defend maze-like levels. Levels are short and intense.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 200 MB available space
